#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
using namespace std;
lli fun(lli a,lli b)
{
	if(a==0)
		return b;

	return fun(b%a,a);
}
int main()
{
	lli i,j,k,m,n,t,n_odd,n_even,m_odd,m_even,numerator,denominator,gcd;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			n_odd=n/2;
			n_even=n/2;
		}
		else
		{
			n_odd=n/2+1;
			n_even=n-(n/2+1);
		}
		if(m%2==0)
		{
			m_odd=m/2;
			m_even=m/2;
		}
		else
		{
			m_odd=m/2+1;
			m_even=m-(m/2+1);
		}
		denominator=n*m;
		numerator=n_odd * m_even + n_even * m_odd;
		gcd=fun(numerator,denominator);
		printf("%lld/%lld\n",numerator/gcd,denominator/gcd);
	}
}
